column4: When I download with wubi, it says it's unable to download the metalink. How do I fix it?
You get the installer from here? http://www.ubuntu.com/download/desktop/windows-installer
here is wubi guide as well, wubi is a tryout option just a heads up. https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WubiGuide
You can transfer that wubi install to a partition as well if you want to later, it is then a regular dualboot.
